name: Refuel and Return!
description:
"Refuel and Return!" is a short 2D top-down game created for the Weekly Game Jam (week 129).

After a warp gone bad, you and your spaceship are alone in an unknown section of space! Navigate to nearby planets and safely land on them to gather resources necessary to refuel your warp drive, so you can return home. However, beware the gravitation pull of those planets, and the asteroids that have gathered near some of them!

Though the game teaches you the controls, here they are, for reference:

  • A and D: Rotate ship
  • J: Boost
